definitions.definition: The digit or figure 4; an occurrence thereof.
Anything measuring four units , as length .
examples: Do you have any more fours ? I want to make this a little taller.

definitions.definition: A person who is four years old.
examples: I'll take the threes, fours and fives and go to the playground.

definitions.definition: An event in which the batsmen run four times between the wickets or, more often, a batsman hits a ball which bounces on the ground before passing over a boundary , resulting in an award of 4 runs for the batting team. If the ball does not bounce before passing over the boundary, a six is awarded instead.
Four-man sweep racing shell, with or without a coxswain .

examples: The team bought a new four last season.

subdefinitions.definition: The crew rowing in a four boat.
A regatta event for four boats.
examples: We got third place in the varsity four .

main_definition: ( countable ) The digit or figure 4; an occurrence thereof.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) Anything measuring four units , as length .
A person who is four years old.

( cricket , countable ) An event in which the batsmen run four times between the wickets or, more often, a batsman hits a ball which bounces on the ground before passing over a boundary , resulting in an award of 4 runs for the batting team. If the ball does not bounce before passing over the boundary, a six is awarded instead.
( rowing ) Four-man sweep racing shell, with or without a coxswain .
( obsolete ) A four- pennyworth of spirits.
